::DarkMouse::

She lets out a blood curdling scream as the shot tears her shoulder apart.  
It nearly severs the already damaged shoulder. She lets go of Turantulas's 
leg and falls to the ground.


--------------Original Message--------------
>From: JP3884@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sun, 18 Jun 2000 11:55:21 EDT
>>::: Hell Beast, followed by Gremlin, Jackle, and Marine arrive on the 
>>Maximal
>battleground. Wepons are drawn and tempers are short. :::
>
>::: Hell Beast yells above the comotion ::: Stop! All of you! We are allies
>and we must work together agianst the Newcomer-
>
>::: Ominous Prime took his only chance and nailed Hell Beast in the back of
>the head with an energy bolt. Hell Beast fell to the ground limp. :::
>
>::: Marine, Gremlin, and Jackle spun around and began to unload rounds on
>Set, Ra, and Ominous who had taken cover behinde several boulders. With the
>way Marine was leveling off the rocks with a few placed missles, they 
>wouldnt
>have cover for long. :::
>
>::: Marine ::: You scum, you shoot men in the back because you are cowards!
>
>::: Gremlin, holding a large pulse laser assult riffle makes the rocks and
>nearby trees look like swiss cheese because he is shooting so much. Soon,
>smoke fills the arena. :::
>
>::: Set ::: Damn it! We cant take on those three, there huge!
>
>::: Ra ::: I think its time to form Dark Messhia!
>
>::: Set ::: Yes! Do it! NOW!
>
>::: Ra, with a bright light glowing from his body leaps into the air and
>floats there waiting for his commrads to combine together. :::
>
>~~~~~~~~~`
>
>::: Transanulas screams in pain as Darkmouse bites into his leg. He points,
>pulls the trigger, and a single shot digs itself into her shoulder. :::
>
>::: Transanulas ::: Damn you vermine! You will pay, and so wil lthe Ram!
>
>::: He begins to fire off random shots at Ramulus. :::
